pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro sattho rājagahā paṭiyālokaṃ gantukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.10: Atha kho te kammiyā taṃ satthaṃ gahetvā acchinditvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.11: “kissa tvaṃ, bhante, jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ gacchasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.13: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.16: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.19: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:1.22: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.8: corā katakammā vā honti akatakammā vā, rājānaṃ vā theyyaṃ gacchanti suṅkaṃ vā pariharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.12: “gacchāmāvuso, gacchāma, bhante; gacchāma, bhante, gacchāmāvuso, ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṃvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.14: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.1.15: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.1: Theyyasatthe theyyasatthasaññī saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.2: Theyyasatthe vematiko saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.3: Theyyasatthe atheyyasatthasaññī saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc66:2.2.4: Bhikkhu saṃvidahati, manussā na saṃvidahanti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
